about_the_game:
Jasper Redds: A Retro Shoot 'Em Up Adventure


Step into the cockpit of Jasper Redds, the eponymous ripster from the sci-fi epic, The Curious Case of Jasper Redds: The Haunted Spaceship. Experience intense, fast-paced action as you dodge enemy fire, collect Xsteel scrap, and upgrade powerful ship systems. Navigate across beautiful expanses of the galaxy in levels filled with challenging foes and epic boss battles. Jasper Redds has more energy than an exploding sun, so strap in as you hit light speed.

Key Features:


  • Intense and Challenging Gameplay: Jasper Redds is not for the faint of heart. Face off against relentless enemies and epic bosses that will test your reflexes and gamer skills. Dodge and dash between hundreds of bullets while returning fire to frag enemy ships and collect their resources.
  • Satisfying Controls: Jasper Redds was created with great love for the shoot 'em up genre, and implements a custom control system that merges the precision of a joystick with the speed of a D-pad, combining the best of both worlds for the ultimate gameplay experience.
  • Vibrant Visuals and Sound: Tear through the galaxy amidst a backdrop of colorful nebulae, imaginative locals from the novel, and a massive variety of diligently-animated enemies. An electrifying original soundtrack accompanies you in your adventure, embodying the frantic feel of the genre.
  • Deep Progression: Unlock and upgrade powerful weapons and abilities to enhance your combat effectiveness, turning Jasper Redds into a state-of-the-art experimental war machine that leverages the exotic forces of the universe.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
